attributes.action: Establish an independent Department of Government Efficiency
attributes.additional_details: The government's finances are in dire straits, making it essential to review all expenditures to ensure they are necessary for the country's operations. Any spending on items deemed non-essential should be halted in order to improve the financial situation.
attributes.background: This independent body should thoroughly review all government expenditures and eliminate any non-essential spending.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Create the Department of Government Efficiency: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
